handlers.description: Processing configurations that define how payment instruments can be collected. Each handler specifies a tokenization or payment collection strategy.

selected_instrument_id.description: The id of the currently selected payment instrument from the instruments array. Set by the agent when submitting payment, and echoed back by the merchant in finalized state.

instruments.description: The payment instruments available for this payment. Each instrument is associated with a specific handler via the handler_id field. Handlers can extend the base payment_instrument schema to add handler-specific fields.
